senses.sense_definition: Relating to <w>heterometabolism</w>; describing insects that undergo incomplete metamorphosis where the young resemble the adults.

examples.text: Biologists classify cockroaches as <w>heterometabolic</w> because their nymphs look very similar to the adults.
Unlike butterflies, <w>heterometabolic</w> insects do not pass through a pupal stage during their development.
